scripts.create-crab-local: cp subgraph.yaml.crab subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ s2sBacking/crab
scripts.remove-crab-local: cp subgraph.yaml.crab subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ s2sBacking/crab
scripts.deploy-crab-local: cp subgraph.yaml.crab subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 s2sBacking/crab
